lyrics:
1 contributori’m hi lyricsintro tpain
yeah man ill smoke with you you know what im sayin
im sayin it aint nothin you know what im sayin it aint shit to me
you know what im sayin its just like i dont wanna be gettin high
cause that shit be lookin like it be havin niggas
you know what im sayin yeah right— believe in all haha yeah
nah man i think im just gettin tired though no joke for real
what you got oh you got a shisha or thats a philly or what
oh thats a shisha okay i mean you know
know niggas rappin about shishas and shit dont believe in all hahaha
chachachachachachall hahaha
you know what im sayin i hit it man roll it
oh you got one alright man let me hit that shit

verse 1 styles p
you can knock on my door but aint nobody home
i might be there but im gone cause im stuck off a zone im gone
im halfbaked like the guy on the couch
and i dont get high on my grouch so i puff on my line and be out
i call my roll dog to pick me up with weed lets hit the road dawg
you blew up with the hood rat the fuck you break the code for
and goddamn i think that im high i think that im high too much haze
but i see my ghost pass within the blink of an eye i see my ghost
and my ghetto niggas know how it feel they know how it feel
i smoke more than a building on fire roll more than the wheel
i get stuck like a car in the mud i get stuck and blow my greens out
and call my nigga tpain and ball us some buds
and choke til i think ima cry oh i think ima die
nah dawg i just think that im high shh
see tpain liveget tickets as low as 57you might also likeverse 2 tpain
hmm see i aint ever smoke before
so ima take two hits and ima blow my mind away
i never thought id be gettin high today hey hey
now its on me again so i take another pull ooh
we in the cadillac floatin like the ocean
suddenly everything was movin in slow motion

chorus tpain
so i take another hit and try to relax
im beatin on my chest cj beatin on my back
somebody help me i think im bout to die
but i got it i got it woah
so i pass the blunt and it came right back to me
but i know that this smoke is still runnin through me
i dont think ima ever open my eyes

postchorus tpain
my homeboy said why
and i said cause im high
dawg i think that im high
dawg i feel like im high
i really think that im high
shit goddamn

verse 3 tpain
damn please stop by the store
cause my mouths dry and i dont run out of votes
ooh them lil debbies got me licking my chops
but i just wanna drink a newport shorts in a box or what
maybe switch a gang a three
i seen fine behinds that wanna hang with me
long as i bring the weed i said cool ima ride on through
thirty minutes later we was gettin high in the room
chorus tpain
and then i take another hit and try to relax
im beatin on my chest this girl is beatin on my back
somebody help me i think im bout to die
but i got it dont touch me i got it
oh i pass the blunt and it came right back to me
but i know that this smoke is still runnin through me
i dont think ima ever open my eyes

postchorus tpain
my homegirl said why
and i said that im high
dawg i think that im high
dawg i really feel like im high
i probably cant sing cause im high1embed
